ygData.subject: Re: Grouping
ygData.msgSnippet: It s not. Bards need REAL hitters and REAL casters in the group to shine.  Same amount of players, add one bard instead of all bards, that group is generally
ygData.messageBody:
It's not.

Bards need REAL hitters and REAL casters in the group to shine. Same amount
of players, add one bard instead of all bards, that group is generally going
to be more effective by a large margin. A LARGE margin.

----- Original Message -----
From: mike st denis <f_one_@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 8:20 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Grouping


>From: mike st denis <f_one_@...>
>
>
>
> How effective would it be to have a group of 20+ level bards all
>togather in a group .I think it would be a very deadly . Has anyone
>orginized such a group to see how effective it can be.
>
>
> P.S. I am new to the list and i think it is great.
> Tallon Goldwing of ECI
